course_description: This course will present a comprehensive look at the real estate development & investment process. The curriculum will discuss the broad concepts and techniques employed in a successful real estate investment, both new development and through acquisitions. The class will tackle specific components of a real estate asset and the individuals involved in the successful execution of a project.
